lines.content: Doobert is an application for managing tasks, optimised for use via a Command Line Interface (CLI).
- Words in `UPPER_CASE` are the parameters to be supplied by the user.
e.g. in `todo DESCRIPTION`, description is a parameter which can be used as `todo go for a run`.
Adds a Todo task into the task list.
Adds a task with deadline into the task list.
Adds an event into the task list.
Marks a task in the task list as done.
- `INDEX` has to be less than or equal to the number of tasks in the task list
Unmarks a task in the task list as undone.
- `INDEX` has to be less than or equal to the number of tasks in the list
Deletes a task in task list.
- `INDEX` has to be less than or equal to the number of tasks in the list
Lists out all tasks from task list containing the keyword.
